title: SumSoc May rework a champion comp!
body:
Hey Summoners,

SUMMONERS SOCIETY MAY COMPETITION

Rework a Champion
Date competition start:1/05/2017
Date competition end:31/05/2017
Winner announced date:1/06/2017

Prizing
-If one clear winner your choice of 1000rp or 3 hextech box/keys. If its draw, 500 rp each.
-Feature on social media.

Description: Rework a champion! Is their a champion that needs a buff? Needs a nerf? Tell us what champion you would rework and why!

Rules:
-Must change at least one ability on the champion.
-Design must be your own.
-Attach a picture of the champion with your submission.
-Must be a member of the summoners society facebook group.

How to submit:
Write under the post in the facebook group, if not pinned just search for MAY rework champion using the search feature.
Submit on discord under the text channel #competition_submission
Submit by email: summonerssocietyofficial@gmail.com
Tag us on twitter: @SumSocOce
Tag us on Instagram: @SummonersSociety

Prizing
-If one clear winner your choice of 1000rp or 3 hextech box/keys. If its draw, 500 rp each.
-Feature on social media.
